DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether use of topical 0.4% ketorolac has any effect on pupil size during vitreoretinal surgery.
DOC.detailed_description: Other outcomes will be to assess postoperative pain and inflammation and visual acuity.
DOC.criteria: Age of 18, routine elective vitrectomy history of trauma, uveitis, prior intraocular surgery within 3 months, requirement of mechanical pupil dilation, prior inclusion of other eye
